column5: Beauty Report thanks for putting it up.

Wow, that was a great report!  That place looks amazing, would love to spend 2 weeks up there.  Perhaps one day I'll give it a shot out there.  Nice going, I mean really nice going.  Thanks for sharing.
AWESOME report thanks for sharing...

Thanks everyone, happy to share it and if you get a chance to head up that way I highly recommend it (and thats just the tip - keep going west and/or north and you've got the insanity of Lac Seul and Vermillion among about a million other lakes).  PigeonFisher - every year we say we're gonna downsize to beans and kraft dinner and every year we stock up with nothing but the best.  Costs more of course but hey, I ain't 15 any more  TackleBuster - if you look at the video I think you can see the lip grips in my hand, we were hoping to get them both in but he spat it a bit too early (there was a net too, not sure why I hadn't thought of that).
Fantastic report... got me ":pine'in" for a trip up north! Thanks so much for taking the time... as many already mentioned, great pic and I felt I was with right there with you! (I wish!) HH

Thanks for taking the time to share that with us!  (I know how long it takes)  A definite candidate for report of the year!  As for good food and wine.  Why wouldn't you take the best?  After all, you are on vacation and the idea is to enjoy yourselves, not just make do.

What a great trip, report and pics!  Looks like you guys had a blast!!  Thanks for sharing!  PS, Grappa made me see colors..ONCE.  Tell me more about the jig setup when you get a chance.  My email is [emailÂ protected]
Man, seeing that many "Eye's" there is now a tear in my eye  great report and pics

Bcee - the jig setup was a tip from solopaddler (and others) on this thread: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=8694 . Just your basic jig with a curly tail grub and a small piece (1/2 inch or so) of worm on it. Here's a sampling of the lures/rigs that worked for me (missing the ones lost to the god of the lake):
Very nice report and pics!  Looks like you guys had some fun.  Congrats on a great trip.  Aaron
What a great report!!! Some nice looking fish there and some beautiful Northern scenery.
That was one of the best reports I've read.  Sounds like you and your buds had a blast.  Awesome pickerel by the way!  Thanks for posting.  Corn Nug
Looks like a blast of a good time. Great fish
Awesome report Sean. Good old Lac. A local favorite for sure. Does Mr. Clara know that you guys buried his truck up to the axles?

Haha Dan, you recognized it did ya? Well Mr. Clara is now retired (well as retired as he gets) and our reckless driver is his son Dave who now runs the joint so we figured we were ok but when Mr. Clara met us out on the water one of the days (didn't get this part of the story in the original post) Dave told him (guess he figured we had 20 feet of water between us so it was safe) and we got nothing bust a nasty glare but then his buddy broke out laughing and he loosened up a bit.  Gotta agree with the 'good old lac' - she never lets you down, great fishery but one of these days we'll have to get your advice on some good trout spouts but I'm not sure you'd want us knuckleheads near anything you like
Quite possibly the best report I've ever seen.  I can't get over that pike hammering that walleye!
Fantastic report and pics, felt like I was on the trip with you...  Mike

All i can say is AMAZING FISHING TRIP!!!!!!!    man thats a great report and awesome pics for sure,too bad about getting the truck stuck,but hey the fishing took that all away,nice sized walleyes,& pike too,and a few tasty shore lunches too,the scenery is soooo nice!!!!!!!! thanks for sharing,it sure did look like a great trip had by all....cheers
Wow.  I don't know what to say, but I have the pictures.
Amazing report, thoroughly enjoyed that!
Awesome report. You by chance weren't at Lac Des Mil lodge were you?
Just did some backroad fishing in Nipigon...it brings me back!
Thanks guys, its Maki Bay Lodge Sirfish
Awesome Report! Love the Videos, thanks
Wow, what an amazing report!
great job !! sounded like a great time !
Great report. Nice youtube material. And very nice pan pictures.
Nice report and some beauty pics.

Now that was an amazing mind blowing detailed report that was better than watching the morning fishing shows Stuck chevy's,poor little eye,great pics and vids.Thank you for taking the time to upload and I know you put alot of time into that one.I thought the stubby beer bottle was history or was that just vintage Beer      MTP

Thanks guys. The stubby is red cap - they had a limited edition bob and doug mackenzie stubby case a few weeks ago and one of the guys had some left.  As for the length I made a point of scribbling down a note each night so I'd remember what had happened then I just sat down and started typing but getting it all set was a nice reminder of all the fun so I didn't mind the time taken at all.
Awesome report Tbay you guys looked like you had a blast and the fish fry sure looks yummy.
Truely awesome report from start to finish.  I was there right  That storm must have been something.  Look at all the leaf pieces stuck to the cabin door  Thanks  Joey
awesome report the piek attacking the walleye is amazing
Great report....thanks for taking the time to share!!  dk
Awesome report, pic's and vid's..  Thanks for sharing.....
Beauty pics and great report. I've always wanted to fish the lake, I drive every year on the way to the moose hunt and it's such a nice area.  Thanks for the report.
This has got to be one of the best reports I've seen. Congrats to you and your buds.
wow thta is one heck of a report!!!!  Good job guys!  CHeers!

Wow!! Talk about a report...complete with pics, video and great commentary.  Great job Sean!  Your trip sure had lots of excitement...from the truck getting stuck, to mother nature at her worst, some GREAT fishing and GREAT times.  Your pics turned out amazing too...they really helped capture what you guys experienced up there.  Thanks for taking the time to put this report together...gotta be one of the best ones I've read!!
Report of the year!  I like that you guys eat and drink in style, while in the bush!
Now that is one hell of a report  , thanks for taking the time sharing your trip with us.
Awesome report,and Pics.  of your trip Thank for sharing.  Steve
Awesome report,and Pics.  of your trip Thank for sharing.  Steve
What a great report! Nothing beats getting away with the highschool buds for a couple of days of fun. Awesome pics of the sunsets, thanks!  Cheers, 1leg
unbelievable.. i dont mind coming into work and getting a sweet report like that, first thing in the morning.. nice job sean..
Thanks for treating us to such a fine report, pics and vids.  What an experience to have that pike hit your walleye, would you have been able to land the pike and walleye?
I thoroughly enjoyed that!  Thanks a ton  suds
